snippet: President Obama takes aim at Mitt Romney’s territorial tax system, in which the overseas profits of American corporations would escape United States taxation altogether.
abstract: Editorial contends that the corporate tax system needs reform in order to raise more revenue, more fairly; criticizes Mitt Romney's proposed territorial tax system, in which the overseas profits of American corporations would escape United States taxation altogether.
lead_paragraph: President Obama takes aim at Mitt Romney’s territorial tax system, in which the overseas profits of American corporations would escape United States taxation altogether.
